alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton; Marion; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:08PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Bradley, southeastern Sequatchie, east central Marion and southern Hamilton Counties through 545 PM EDT/445 PM CDT/... At 508 PM EDT/408 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fairmount, or 11 miles south of Dunlap, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Soddy-Daisy, Signal Mountain, Walden, Whitwell, Ridgeside, Fairmount, Harrison, Red Bank and Collegedale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for east Tennessee.
